modName: muscle mod and BBE fully matching v1_02
summary: this thing make compatible the mod made by khajitree and dragonsan great thanks to them!!!
descriptionHtml:
Hi,
update is come!!!! 

you must download first Caliente BBE here http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666  and then install it as well.

then overwrite the msn.dds files in your Data\\textures\\actors\\characters\\female folder

choose one of them muscle/ chiseled/ soft body



i hope you\'ll enjoy my mod and my upload.



What it doe\'s?
--------------

It make matching female texture named:

\"-High_Res_4096-_Female_Body_Mod_BBE_Strip_v0_1_Khajitsree-2841-0-1 \"

find here:
----------


http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2841

thanks to khajitsree

with this mod named:
--------------------
\"Female_Muscle_Mod_-_DIESEL-44-1-4\"

find here:
----------



http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=44

thanks to tigersan




Who to install?
---------------

1st unzip my mod.

2nd copy \"data\" files found in it, by pressing \"ctrl+c\"

3rd open your skyrim folder

4th past what you get in it

5th juste say \"yes! i want for sure!!!\"

then you can choose your final skin, by opening \"Skyrim\\  \\Data\\Textures\\female\\\"and extract one of them directly.


Normal skin is the pure High_Res_4096-_Female_Body with a boob\'s fix

\'bottomblackshadow\' is the same look but without a weird black line... and wihtout hair... (poor dirty female.... )


tatoo skin is my ouwn textures.  I put some nice... hum... tatoos.




Thanks for downloading this fix mod. enjoy !!!
author: Shootme
